```html .class = what it does ```
*** ### Sass Variables You can customize with [Item] with these variables in _settings.scss: ```scss $whatever-I-am: value; ``` *** ### Using the Javascript Optional Javascript Configurations: ```js $locationProvider.html5Mode({ enabled: true, requireBase: true }); ```
